standardmessages.birthday: Mate, happy Birthday. To celebrate this once a year occasion we have picked the following gift: [gift]. Enjoy.
standardmessages.babybirth: Whooa well done and congratulations on the birth of [babyname] on [birthdate].

aboutus.text: Comprised of the best and the brightest, each member of the LambdaS IO team is recognized for their love of making the abstract becomes real. We are believers that one size doesn't' fit all and that's why we are specialised in custom software development - if you want a tailored and unique software solution we are here to assist your business. From early stage Startups to well-established Enterprises, we've got you covered. We recruited a new generation of IT Professionals into our ranks and our numbers are growing as highly qualified professionals continue to join our cause.
